customSolution.name: Azure Backup Monitoring Solution
customSolution.description: Monitor and analyze your Backup Vaults
customSolution.author: Microsoft

Header.Label: Monitoring Solution pack for Azure Backup

List.Title: Monitor Azure Backup!
List.Content:
## Welcome to the monitoring solution of Azure Backup!
You can view:

1.  **Backup Jobs** and what backup jobs *failed*
2. **Restore jobs** and what restore jobs *failed*
3. **Critical Alerts** that need your urgent attention
4. **Cloud Storage in GB** view along with **Top 5** datasources backed up along with their storage in GB
5. **Data sources** being backed up


[Microsoft](https://assets.onestore.ms/cdnfiles/onestorerolling-1607-15000/shell/v3/images/logo/microsoft.png "Microsoft")

Donut.Query: AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Job" | extend JobOperationSubType_s = columnifexists("JobOperationSubType_s", "") | where JobOperation_s == "Backup" and JobOperationSubType_s != "Log" and JobOperationSubType_s != "Recovery point_Log" | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(JobUniqueId_g) by JobStatus_s | order by AggregatedValue desc

List.Query: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | extend JobOperationSubType_s = columnifexists("JobOperationSubType_s", "") | where OperationName == "Job" and JobOperation_s == "Backup" and JobStatus_s == "Failed" and JobOperationSubType_s != "Log" and JobOperationSubType_s != "Recovery point_Log" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, JobStatus_s, Resource | extend Vault= Resource | summarize count() by BackupItemFriendlyName_s, JobStatus_s, Vault | order by count_ desc
List.NavigationQuery: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | extend JobOperationSubType_s = columnifexists("JobOperationSubType_s", "") | where OperationName == "Job" and JobOperation_s == "Backup" and JobStatus_s == "Failed" and JobOperationSubType_s != "Log" and JobOperationSubType_s != "Recovery point_Log" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | join kind=leftouter (     Events     | where OperationName == "ProtectedContainer"     | distinct ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s     | project ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s , ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s ) on ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s, BackupItemType_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | extend Vault= Resource | where {selected item}

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | extend JobOperationSubType_s = columnifexists("JobOperationSubType_s", "") | where OperationName == "Job" and JobOperation_s == "Backup" and JobStatus_s == "Failed" and JobOperationSubType_s != "Log" and JobOperationSubType_s != "Recovery point_Log" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | join kind=leftouter (     Events     | where OperationName == "ProtectedContainer"     | distinct ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s     | project ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s , ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s ) on ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s, BackupItemType_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | extend Vault= Resource | where {selected item}

Donut.Query: AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Job" | extend JobOperationSubType_s = columnifexists("JobOperationSubType_s", "") | where JobOperation_s == "Backup" and (JobOperationSubType_s == "Log" or JobOperationSubType_s == "Recovery point_Log") | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(JobUniqueId_g) by JobStatus_s | order by AggregatedValue desc

List.Query: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | extend JobOperationSubType_s = columnifexists("JobOperationSubType_s", "") | where OperationName == "Job" and JobOperation_s == "Backup" and JobStatus_s == "Failed" and (JobOperationSubType_s == "Log" or JobOperationSubType_s == "Recovery point_Log") | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s , JobStatus_s, Resource | extend Vault= Resource | summarize count() by BackupItemFriendlyName_s, JobStatus_s, Vault | order by count_ desc
List.NavigationQuery: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | extend JobOperationSubType_s = columnifexists("JobOperationSubType_s", "") | where OperationName == "Job" and JobOperation_s == "Backup" and JobStatus_s == "Failed" and (JobOperationSubType_s == "Log" or JobOperationSubType_s == "Recovery point_Log") | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | join kind=leftouter (     Events     | where OperationName == "ProtectedContainer"     | distinct ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s     | project ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s , ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s ) on ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s, BackupItemType_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | extend Vault= Resource | where {selected item}

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | extend JobOperationSubType_s = columnifexists("JobOperationSubType_s", "") | where OperationName == "Job" and JobOperation_s == "Backup" and JobStatus_s == "Failed" and (JobOperationSubType_s == "Log" or JobOperationSubType_s == "Recovery point_Log") | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | join kind=leftouter (     Events     | where OperationName == "ProtectedContainer"     | distinct ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s     | project ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s , ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s ) on ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s, BackupItemType_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | extend Vault= Resource | where {selected item}

Donut.Query: AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Job"  | where JobOperation_s == "Restore"  | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(JobUniqueId_g) by JobStatus_s | order by AggregatedValue desc

List.Query: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | where OperationName == "Job" and JobOperation_s == "Restore" and JobStatus_s == "Failed" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s , JobStatus_s, Resource | extend Vault= Resource | summarize count() by BackupItemFriendlyName_s, JobStatus_s, Vault | order by count_ desc
List.NavigationQuery: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | where OperationName == "Job" and JobOperation_s == "Restore" and JobStatus_s == "Failed" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | join kind=leftouter (     Events     | where OperationName == "ProtectedContainer"     | distinct ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s     | project ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s , ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s ) on ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s, BackupItemType_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | extend Vault= Resource | where {selected item}

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | where OperationName == "Job" and JobOperation_s == "Restore" and JobStatus_s == "Failed" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | join kind=leftouter (     Events     | where OperationName == "ProtectedContainer"     | distinct ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s     | project ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s , ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s ) on ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s, BackupItemType_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | extend Vault= Resource | where {selected item}

Donut.Query: AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize count() by AlertSeverity_s

List.Query: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport"; Events | where OperationName == "Alert" | project AlertSeverity_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource | join kind=inner (Events | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, AlertSeverity_s | extend Vault= Resource       | summarize count() by BackupItemFriendlyName_s, Vault, AlertSeverity_s | order by count_ desc
List.NavigationQuery: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | where OperationName == "Alert" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource,  AlertOccurrenceDateTime_s, AlertSeverity_s, AlertStatus_s,  AlertType_s, AlertUniqueId_s, VaultUniqueId_s, SubscriptionId | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, JobStatus_s, Resource,  AlertOccurrenceDateTime_s, AlertSeverity_s, AlertStatus_s,  AlertType_s, AlertUniqueId_s, VaultUniqueId_s, SubscriptionId | extend Vault= Resource | where {selected item}

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | where OperationName == "Alert" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, JobStatus_s, Resource,  AlertOccurrenceDateTime_s, AlertSeverity_s, AlertStatus_s,  AlertType_s, AlertUniqueId_s, VaultUniqueId_s, SubscriptionId | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, JobStatus_s, Resource,  AlertOccurrenceDateTime_s, AlertSeverity_s, AlertStatus_s,  AlertType_s, AlertUniqueId_s, VaultUniqueId_s, SubscriptionId | extend Vault= Resource | where {selected item}

Donut.Query: let Events = AzureDiagnostics   | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ;   Events   | where OperationName == "Job"    | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , Resource | join kind=inner   (Events    | where OperationName == "BackupItem"    | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemType_s    | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemType_s)   on BackupItemUniqueId_s   | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, Resource, BackupItemType_s | summarize dcount(BackupItemFriendlyName_s) by BackupItemType_s

List.Query: let Events = AzureDiagnostics   | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ;   Events   | where OperationName == "Job" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , JobStatus_s, Resource    | join kind=inner  (Events    | where OperationName == "BackupItem"  | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s    | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s )   on BackupItemUniqueId_s   | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s , JobStatus_s, Resource   | extend Vault= Resource | summarize count() by BackupItemFriendlyName_s | order by count_ desc
List.NavigationQuery: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | where OperationName == "Job" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, JobOperation_s ,JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | join kind=leftouter (     Events     | where OperationName == "ProtectedContainer"     | distinct ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s     | project ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s , ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s ) on ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s, JobOperation_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | extend Vault= Resource | where {selected item}

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let Events = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" ; Events | where OperationName == "Job" | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, JobOperation_s ,JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | join kind=inner (     Events     | where OperationName == "BackupItem"     | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s , BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | join kind=leftouter (     Events     | where OperationName == "ProtectedContainer"     | distinct ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s     | project ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s , ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s ) on ProtectedContainerUniqueId_s | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, BackupItemName_s, BackupItemType_s, ProtectedContainerFriendlyName_s, JobOperation_s, JobStatus_s, Resource, JobFailureCode_s | extend Vault= Resource | where {selected item}

LineChart.Query: AzureDiagnostics        | where Category == "AzureBackupReport"        | where StorageConsumedInMBs_s != ""       | extend CloudStorageInGB = todouble(StorageConsumedInMBs_s) / 1024       | summarize sum(CloudStorageInGB) by bin(ingestion_time(), 1d)     | order by ingestion_time() desc

List.Query: let Events = AzureDiagnostics    | where Category == "AzureBackupReport";    Events    | where OperationName == "StorageAssociation" | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)    | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, Resource, StorageConsumedInMBs_s, TimeGenerated | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, Resource, StorageConsumedInMBs_s      | join kind=inner   ( Events          | where OperationName == "BackupItem"          | distinct BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s          | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s)     on BackupItemUniqueId_s     | project BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s, Resource, StorageConsumedInMBs_s        | extend Vault= Resource,  CloudStorageInGB = todouble(StorageConsumedInMBs_s) / 1024     | project BackupItemFriendlyName_s, CloudStorageInGB | top 5 by CloudStorageInGB desc
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Donut.Query: AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Job" | extend JobOperationSubType_s = columnifexists("JobOperationSubType_s", "") | where JobOperation_s == "Backup" and JobOperationSubType_s != "Log" and JobOperationSubType_s != "Recovery point_Log" | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(JobUniqueId_g) by JobStatus_s | order by AggregatedValue desc
